org.radixware.jiraclient.implementation.rest

Class RestJiraClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.radixware.jiraclient.implementation.common.AbstractJiraClient
      • org.radixware.jiraclient.implementation.rest.RestJiraClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JiraClient

    public final class RestJiraClient
extends AbstractJiraClient
    REST JIRA Remote Client. Some functions are implemented based on raw REST API via HTTP with using of JSON Objects.
    Author:
    ashamsutdinov

      • getApacheHttpClient

        public ApacheHttpClient getApacheHttpClient()
        Low-level handler for debugging and development. Use it to send manually constructed REST queries. Also see org.codehaus.jettison.json.* for work with JSON messages.
